titleStmt.title: The treasure of traffike, or, A discourse of forraigne trade wherein is shewed the benefit and commoditie arising to a commonwealth or kingdome, by the skilfull merchant, and by a well ordered commerce and regular traffike / by Lewes Roberts ...
titleStmt.author: Roberts, Lewes, 1596-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. P. for Nicholas Bourne ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
